title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Mar 02 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Mar 02 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Mayor Pete pulls out, Trump now youngest man running for president. Drive-Bys lie about Trump calling coronavirus a “hoax”. Last week, Drive-Bys knew Biden had no chance, even if he won South Carolina. Now that he won, Drive-Bys are all-in on him, even though Crazy Bernie is still way ahead. Obama, Biden spoke to Mayor Pete. The decapitation of Crazy Bernie’s campaign has begun. Where’s Chris Matthews? Van Jones Friday: Biden is dead man walking. Montage of Drive-Bys one week ago, convinced Crazy Bernie had it won. North Korea shoots coronavirus patient. No need for coronavirus panic, market going back up. Headlines on coronavirus are insane. F. Chuck Todd demands Pence name somebody politicizing the virus, Pence does it.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Larry King says Rush will never win a Pulitzer. Media trying to create coronavirus panic. Chuck Todd interviews Pence, asks about Rush. CNN guest psychoanalyzes Rush, audience. CNBC: 10,000 dead from flu. Klobuchar drops out, backs Biden. Crazy Bernie backed by wealthiest zip codes. Somebody got to Klobuchar. Democrat establishment scared to death of Sanders, want to rid themselves of AOC and The Squad. Who has the juice to make Buttigieg and Klobuchar drop out on eve of Super Tuesday?

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

You can’t talk rationally to people with irrational fears. Gerald Ford and the swine flu panic of 1976. Nobody reporting the coronavirus recovery rate. Ayatollah advisor dies of coronavirus. Anthony Fauci: Nobody gagged me. Dems have rejected people of color, gay guy, in favor of 4 white millionaires. Abortion still leading cause of death in America. Caller says Rush taught him to reject fear. Max Boot lies about Rush. Bill Kristol endorses Biden, the guy who led the fight to keep Clarence Thomas off the Supreme Court.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
